import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import './home.css'; import RoleCard from '../components/RoleCard'; import dsRoles from '../utils/dsRoles'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const history = useHistory(); const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.2, delayChildren: 0.3, }, }, }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { y: 20, opacity: 0 }, visible: { y: 0, opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.6, ease: [0.6, -0.05, 0.01, 0.99] }, }, }; const stats = [ { value: '10K+', label: 'Active Learners' }, { value: '500+', label: 'Learning Paths' }, { value: '50+', label: 'Expert Mentors' }, { value: '24/7', label: 'Support Available' }, ]; const features = [ { icon: '📊', title: 'Interactive Learning', description: 'Hands-on projects and real-world datasets to practice with' }, { icon: '🎯', title: 'Personalized Paths', description: 'Customized learning journeys based on your goals' }, { icon: '🏆', title: 'Certification', description: 'Earn recognized certificates upon completion' }, { icon: '🤝', title: 'Community', description: 'Connect with peers and experts in our forums' }, ]; const goToRole = (role) => { history.push(`/role/${role.slug}`); }; return (
